pages.text: $(li)Loot tables have been updated with popular items. $(li)Each theme now has custom graphics for each key! $(li)Added a config feature to prevent blocks from dropping items. $(li)Added 12 new rooms!

$(li)Added natural skylight to the personal build dimension. $(li)Reverted the ambient light in the dungeon dimension. Rooms will now appear intentionally dark! $(li)Changed the recipe for the personal dimension key.
